content.rendered:
>Horus E1 It is a time and attendance mobile device that can stand for more than 8 hours full battery (turn off Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, Bluetooth)
Full charge in 5-6 hours. It is one of the most advanced timekeeping and attendance devices with an incredibly compact size and powerful facial recognition technology
In the market. This device provides a recognition distance of up to 3 meters , a position angle variation of 30 degrees with a maximum of 10,000 face casts , high anti-plagiarism ability, and supports abundant communication
It can be protocols (Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, Bluetooth) and global network settings, supports the positioning function used to upload attendance location information to the system and the zkbiosecurity and BioTime platform.

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against printing attack (laser, color images, black and white images), video attack, three-dimensional mask attack.
• A 5-inch IPS touchscreen display from the smartphone category.
• Various other development options: built-in GPS / A-GPS system, microphone and PIR sensor.
• GPS attendance records support sending to the Biotime platform only
